segments.text: Good day to you . How can we assist you today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , yes , can I do Bank-Insurance Link business here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , you can . The best way is to first select the company you want to buy from , then we can help you to do it . Do you have a Current Account here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it certainly makes everything easier , both at this end and at your end .
segments.speaker: S1
